section.title: Plugins
section.para: Plugins are the mechanism of extending Sylpheed-Claws capabilities. Imagine you want to store your mails in a remote SQL database. In most mailers out there this is simply impossible without reworking the internals of it. With Sylpheed-Claws you can simply write a plugin to achieve the task.

This is only an example of the possibilities. Already exist a good number of plugins developed for Sylpheed-Claws, and more are to come. The Extending Sylpheed-Claws section is devoted to all of them.
